Are you sure you want to create a databa: Are you sure you want to create a database for :facility? This will create a new tenant database.
Are you sure you want to run migrations: Are you sure you want to run migrations for :facility? This will update the database schema.
Are you sure you want to rollback migrat: Are you sure you want to rollback migrations for :facility? This will revert the database schema changes.
Are you sure you want to seed the databa: Are you sure you want to seed the database for :facility? This will add default data and may modify existing records.
Are you sure you want to create a backup: Are you sure you want to create a backup for :facility? This will create a database backup file.
DANGER: Are you absolutely sure you want: DANGER: Are you absolutely sure you want to permanently delete the database for :facility? This action will destroy ALL data and CANNOT be undone!
Create your first backup to get started.
Are you sure you want to restore this ba: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? This will replace the current database and cannot be undone!

It is with deep regret that we inform yo: It is with deep regret that we inform you of the passing of our employee, :employee_name, on :date. Please contact the HR department for information regarding the final settlement of dues.
Our sincere condolences to the family an: Our sincere condolences to the family and friends of the deceased.
This letter serves to confirm the end of: This letter serves to confirm the end of your service with the company, effective from :date. We request you to visit the finance department to settle your final dues.
We thank you for your contributions and: We thank you for your contributions and wish you success in your future endeavors.
We are pleased to inform you that you ha: We are pleased to inform you that you have been rehired by the company, effective from :date. Please review the HR department to complete the necessary procedures.
Based on the resignation request submitt: Based on the resignation request submitted by you, we would like to inform you that the management has approved your resignation from work, effective from the date of :date, so please review the financial department to pay your dues.
We wish you all the best in your future: We wish you all the best in your future work
This letter is to inform you that you ha: This letter is to inform you that you have been suspended from your duties, effective from :date. This action is taken pending further investigation. You will be contacted with more information in due course.
Please await further instructions from t: Please await further instructions from the HR department.
The company administration would like to: The company administration would like to inform you of the decision to dispense with your services as of :date, so please review the accounts department to pay your dues.
